newsitem.title: USA: Maxxon Inc to buy Texas drug firm.
newsitem.headline: Maxxon Inc to buy Texas drug firm.

text.p: Maxxon Inc said it signed a letter of intent to acquire a Texas-based pharmaceutical company in exchange for 1,252,950 shares of restricted common stock of Maxxon.
The name of the firm to be acquired was not given.
The acquisition will be accounted for as a purchase. A definitive agreement is expected to be completed within 30 days.
Maxxon said the company it plans to acquire was founded in 1991 and has focused on marketing, distributing and acquiring non-prescription pharmaceutical and nutraceutical products.
Maxxon is developing a patented, disposable safety syringe that automatically retracts the needle into the plunger after use.
